'''''Minecraft: The Manga'' Volume 3''' is the third {{W|tankōbon}} volume of the ''[[Minecraft: The Manga]]'' series.

== Chapters ==
*11. An Eternal Wish Lost in Snow! (吹雪に消えた永遠の願い, ''Fubuki ni Kieta Eien no Negai'')
*12. Bad-Guy Town Ahead! (悪党だらけの町に気をつけろ!!, ''Akutō-daraka no Machi ni Kiwotsukero!!'')
*13. Mob Swarm! (モンスター大量発生!!, ''Monsutā Tairyō Hassei!!'')
*14. The Blow to Crush Evil! (悪を打ち砕く一撃!!, ''Aku o Uchikudaku Ichigeki!!'')
*15. Icco White's Past! (明かされる父の過去!!, ''Akasa Reru Chichi no Kako!!'')
